caption.p: Mean percentages (±SE) of marked and unmarked Halyomorpha halys adults captured in the four study areas from late April to mid-June. Lower case and upper case letters indicate significant differences between 10-day periods for albumin positive and unmarked specimens, respectively (Tukey’s test following one-way ANOVA, p < 0.05). On the x-axis, for each 10-day periods, the total number of tested specimens is given in brackets.
